title: Puffin Postcard
body_html:
Share the love with these luxuriously thick and fountain pen friendly A6-size postcards.

  • Luxurious 32pt four-layer composition: Substantial thickness for a premium feel
  • Mohawk Superfine Paper: Elegant matte finish with distinctive black middle seam
  • Fountain-Pen-Friendly: Sorbent writing surface for smooth, crisp characters
  • Featuring photography work by Pavel Svoroda

Each postcard is manufactured in the USA and measures 5.83" wide by 4.13" tall.

title: Sunset Blush
body_html:
Sunset Blush is part of the Keystone Formula fountain pen ink line, our traditional dye-colorant ink. The 30mL volume will provide approximately 37 standard converter refills assuming a 0.8mL draw. Our ink swatch is produced with a cotton swab on Tomoe River paper. 

The top half of each swatch showcases the ink under 5500K lighting (similar to daylight), while the bottom half reveals its appearance under 2700K lighting (comparable to warm indoor bulbs). This presentation lets you preview how the ink's hue transforms across different environments, from office fluorescents to reading nooks.

5500K (Daylight) sources:

  • Natural daylight (morning to midday)
  • "Daylight" LED bulbs
  • Some fluorescent office lighting

2700K (Warm) sources:

  • Traditional incandescent bulbs
  • "Soft white" LED bulbs
  • Candlelight (though slightly warmer, around 1800K-2200K)

Enjoy Sunset Blush as a standalone fountain pen ink, or blend it with other Birmingham Pen Co. fountain pen inks to craft your personalized shade.

title: Amperage Azure Twinkle
body_html:
Make your writing sparkle with TwINKle inks! These inks contain shimmering particles that create a uniquely beautiful writing line. 

Twinkle inks require additional pen maintenance and cleaning compared to their traditional ink peers and perform best in a pen with a medium point-grade nib or broader. Please don't use Twinkle inks in vintage pens or pens that cannot be disassembled for cleaning. 

Every batch of Birmingham fountain pen ink is manufactured by hand in-house from a series of raw ingredients selected for quality and consistency. Each bottle is poured, capped, and labeled by hand.

title: Molten Magma
body_html:
Our fiery Molten Magma is a highly saturated glowing red hue that may operate on the dry side in some pens. Easily make the ink perform wetter by reducing viscosity to taste, blending with Dilution Solution or another Birmingham Pen Company ink. Visual properties will gradually alter with dilution, varying by diluent. Regular pen cleaning is suggested and could require extra effort, but the dye colorants are entirely water-soluble. This supersaturated hue performs best with broad point-grade nibs or thicker.

Molten Magma is part of the Keystone Formula fountain pen ink line, our traditional dye-colorant ink. The generous 120mL volume will provide approximately 150 standard converter refills assuming a 0.8mL draw.

Enjoy Molten Magma as a standalone fountain pen ink, or blend it with other Birmingham Pen Co. fountain pen inks to craft your personalized shade.

title: Saltmarsh
body_html:
Saltmarsh is one of two new inks that portray a characteristic we've never observed in our ink formulation adventures. Depending on the type of light in proximity to the ink it can change from a marshy green all the way to a light coffee brown. We're not certain what wavelength of light causes this unique phenomenon as yet. In our experience the ink shifts to the coffee tone in daylight, and back to the green tone in most (though not all) indoor lighting.

Saltmarsh is part of the Keystone Formula fountain pen ink line, our traditional dye-colorant ink. The 30mL volume will provide approximately 37 standard converter refills assuming a 0.8mL draw. Our ink swatch is produced with a cotton swab on Tomoe River paper.

Enjoy Saltmarsh as a standalone fountain pen ink, or blend it with other Birmingham Pen Co. fountain pen inks to craft your personalized shade.

title: Jupiter Vortex Twinkle
body_html:
Dive into the cosmic allure of Jupiter Vortex Twinkle, a supersaturated part of our Twinkle Formula fountain pen line. This ink transcends the ordinary with its rich, bronze-brown base, energized by a fluorescent green sheen and Twinkle pigment accents. Unique in its composition, the ink appears curiously purple-hued in the bottle, adding a touch of mystery to your collection.

Jupiter Vortex Twinkle is a shimmering spectacle jam-packed with dyes and pigment. A broad nib point grade or larger is recommended to carry the thick viscosity. This supersaturated hue offers approximately 125 standard converter refills from its generous 100mL volume.

Our swatch was produced on 68gsm Tomoe River paper, which emphasizes the secondary colors specifically. It's challenging to display the color array of sheening inks on-screen.

Visible coloring will vary drastically by paper type and saturation.

Twinkle inks require additional pen maintenance and cleaning compared to their traditional ink peers. Please don't use Twinkle inks in vintage pens or pens that cannot be disassembled for cleaning.

title: Extradimensional Umber
body_html:
An ultra-saturated quasi-sheener, Extradimensional Umber is a breakthrough that manifested last year. With a robust sepia base and a hint of green sheen at the right angle, stretching to sandy caramel on a speedier stroke, this hue will surely be one of the most mind-bending in your collection. Swatch and writing tests are pictured with a cotton swab/broad nib on Tomoe River paper under white fluorescent lighting.

WARNING: Photographing the character in this ink is difficult. I've done my best to capture the extradimensional nuance, but you're bound to find something new as you play with stronger and weaker saturations on different papers in various lighting atmospheres. The rich colorant saturation in Extradimensional Umber is on par with the most saturated inks we can produce while maintaining good operation within a fountain pen.

Since this is an extremely saturated ink, some pens may operate on the dry side. Easily make the ink perform wetter by reducing viscosity to taste, blending with Dilution Solution or another Birmingham Pen Company ink. Visual properties will gradually alter with dilution, varying by properties of diluting hue. Frequent pen cleaning is suggested and could require extra effort, but the dye colorants are entirely water-soluble. This supersaturated hue performs best with broad point-grade nibs or thicker.

Extradimensional Umber is part of the Keystone Formula fountain pen ink line, our traditional dye-colorant ink. The 60mL volume will provide approximately 75 standard converter refills, assuming a 0.8mL draw.

Enjoy Extradimensional Umber as a standalone fountain pen ink or blend it with other Birmingham Pen Co. fountain pen inks to craft your personalized shade.

title: Twinkle Sprinkle
body_html:
Introducting Twinkle Sprinkle - our new pigmented fountain pen ink additive designed to add an enchanting luster to your Birmingham Pen Company inks. Infuse your writings with a twinkling sparkle that brings your words to life, making every stroke expression of your creativity.

This 100mL volume of shimmering innovation comes in a convenient glass bottle with a dropper cap, perfect for precise applications. Unleash your creativity and add a touch of magic to your writing with Twinkle Sprinkle.

title: Dilution Solution
body_html:
Our handmade Dilution Solution is a meticulously formulated fountain pen ink diluent designed to lighten the hue of all Birmingham Pen Company fountain pen inks. This gives you the unique ability to adjust the intensity of your ink's color to your preference, giving your writing an extra touch of individuality and style.

Dilution Solution is simple to use and works seamlessly with our inks. However, to ensure optimal performance and consistency of your fountain pen, we advise not exceeding a 30 percent concentration of Dilution Solution in your ink blend. Each unit comes prepared in a 120mL amber glass dropper bottle.

Unlike water, which can lead to dry writing and a weakened preservative, our Dilution Solution will thin colorant while maintaining optimal ink performance. Tap water may harbor bacteria and particulate impurities that could potentially interfere with long-term pen function. Dilution Solution ensures ink purity and consistency, thereby safeguarding your fountain pen's smooth operation.

Discover a world of possibilities as you experiment with different color intensities to match your mood, your project, or your inspiration. With Dilution Solution, you hold the power to make a fountain pen ink truly your own.

Quantum Teal is part of the Keystone Formula fountain pen ink line, our traditional dye-colorant ink. The 30mL volume will provide approximately 37 standard converter refills assuming a 0.8mL draw. Our ink swatch is produced with a cotton swab on Tomoe River paper.

This ink will produce a sheening effect on high-quality papers like Tomoe River and Rhodia. Our writing sample in this listing was made on 68 gsm Tomoe River paper.

Enjoy Quantum Teal as a standalone fountain pen ink, or blend it with other Birmingham Pen Co. inks to craft your personalized shade.

title: Bronzium
body_html:
The heavyweight Bronzium Model-C is machined from solid bronze alloy and rests at a colossal three ounces in total weight. An absolute unit of a writing machine, the Bronzium is among the heaviest fountain pens ever manufactured to our knowledge.

Bronzium parts begin as a round bar of solid bronze alloy before being machined into one of four separate pieces: barrel, grip section, cap body, & cap finial. After Dad uses a lathe to shape each component, parts are delicately refined to a matte finish. Next, Nick individually bends each clip by hand, followed by tumbling to soften edges and produce a consistent finish. Lastly, each pen is fully assembled per customer request. The Bronzium includes a removable ink converter and choice of nib installed.

As the bronze ages, expect a patina to develop over time. Bronze is resistant to corrosion but not entirely immune. Eyedropper conversions and prolonged direct contact with ink on the bronze are not suggested. 

Every heirloom quality Bronzium Fountain Pen includes our 100% satisfaction guarantee and lifetime warranty. Since we build each pen to order, please allow 4-5 weeks for manufacturing & shipment.

title: Alumina
body_html:
FREE Studio Collection Ink Bottle
when added to cart with purchase. ($25 VALUE)
See description for details.* 

Finished and ready to ship! The lightweight Alumina Model-C features a matte-finished aluminum alloy with unique hand-shaped pocket clip. Every pen includes a removable ink converter reservoir and German nib installed. 

Alumina parts begin as a round bar of solid aluminum alloy before being machined with a CNC Lathe into one of four separate pieces: barrel, grip section, cap body, & cap finial. After the lathe to shapes each component, parts are delicately refined to a matte finish. Next, a clip is individually shaped by hand, followed by tumbling to soften edges and produce a consistent finish. Lastly, each pen is fully assembled.

Aluminum is a very soft metal that will develop wear over time, varying based on use and storage. Prolonged contact with ink may cause corrosion. Eyedropper conversions are strongly discouraged, and it's best to clean any ink in direct contact with a metal surface. 

Fully finished & ready to ship!

 

All house pens include FREE Shipping within mainland U.S.A.

title: Carbon
body_html:
The Carbon Model-C Fountain Pen features meticulously polished midnight black resin with a unique hand-shaped pocket clip. 

Carbon parts begin as a round bar of solid black resin before being machined into one of four separate pieces: barrel, grip section, cap body, & cap finial. After Dad uses a lathe to shape each component, parts are delicately refined to a polished finish. Next, Nick individually bends each clip by hand, followed by tumbling to soften edges and produce a consistent finish. Lastly, each pen is fully assembled per customer request. The Bronzium includes a removable ink converter and choice of nib installed.

The grip section of the Model-C includes extra threading to ensure a secure seal for writers who prefer to eyedropper the pen. We’ve included a silicone gasket that may be installed in the section for added security. Silicone grease is recommended on both the nib housing and section threading before an eyedropper conversion.

Every heirloom quality Carbon Fountain Pen includes our 100% satisfaction guarantee and lifetime warranty. Since we build each pen to order, please allow 4-5 weeks for manufacturing & shipment.

title: Nightshade Twinkle
body_html:
Make your writing sparkle with our new TwINKle inks! These inks contain a shimmering particulate that create a beautifully unique writing line. 

We regularly receive feedback from satisfied customers saying that our Twinkle Formula ink series are some of the most twinkly, consistently performing sparkling inks on the market. Josh developed an ink vehicle unique to our Twinkle Formula line, designed specifically to operate as carrier for both the water soluble dye colorant base as well as the (much larger) Twinkle pigment. We've carefully chosen our pigment to operate well in high concentrations relative to our vehicle, and consistently display maximum luster on a wide variety of papers.

Twinkle inks require additional pen maintenance and cleaning compared to their traditional ink peers and perform best in a pen with a medium sized nib or broader. Please don't use Twinkle inks in vintage pens or pens that cannot be disassembled for cleaning. 

Every batch of Birmingham fountain pen ink is manufactured by hand in-house from a series of raw ingredients selected for quality and consistency. Each bottle is poured, capped, and labeled by hand.

Ink Ingredients
Diluent - Highly purified laboratory grade water to ensure consistency
Thickener - Tempers feathering
Humectants - Influences dry-time
Lubricants - Regulates flow & performance
Surfactants - Regulates flow & performance
Preservative - Adds shelf life for safe long-term use & storage
Colorants - A combination of dyes and pigments bring the ink to life

title: Oblique Broad #6 Gilded
body_html:
This #6 size Knox nib features a tipped oblique broad tip with the Knox design stamp. The two-tone process is subtractive in that each nib is fully gold plated then individually dipped into a solution to remove the gilding to expose the polished steel underneath.

Our Collar & Feeder option arrives with the nib pre-installed into housing with feeder, compatible with our Model-C fountain pens.

title: Monotonic
body_html:
Monotonic is a versatile ink-channel solution that expedites fountain pen testing, tuning, maintenance, and cleaning. Our gentle, handmade formula streamlines similar operations at the workshop and is compatible with all fountain pens. Containing zero dyes or pigments, Monotonic is designed with components of a standard fountain pen ink vehicle to leverage the utility of a writing backbone without the extra attention required to work around colorant.

Monotonic is built with a highly purified water diluent and a delicate mixture of humectant, lubricant, and preservative. The solution will safely air-dry after use or operate as the segue to a new ink while still damp with a minimal impact on performance and hue. Each unit comes prepared in a 120mL amber glass dropper bottle.

DOES NOT contain ammonia or bleach.

title: Ironsides
body_html:
A virtually indestructible writing fortress, the hefty Ironsides is our very first alloy fountain pen. Fully machined by Dad from a high-grade stainless steel rod, each fabricated part undergoes at least three finishing steps before the assembly of the section, barrel, cap, and threaded finial. Every piece includes a proprietary pocket clip shaped by hand in-house on Nick's homemade clip jig.

Each pen is built to order with your choice of ten nib options. Pocket clips on the Ironsides are swappable post-purchase; we plan to have a variety of clip finishes available in the future beyond the two options we have today. A removable full-size ink converter comes installed. 

Since this is a Production pen release, each piece is assigned a unique engraved index number with a matching hand-stamped letterpress Certificate of Authenticity. The unique index number indicates the year, month, and day the pen was completed, along with its place within the day's production... making every engraving one-of-a-kind. Our fountain pens include a removable ink converter and a choice of nib installed.

Every heirloom quality Model-C fountain pen includes our 100% satisfaction guarantee and lifetime warranty. Since we build each piece to order, please allow 4-5 weeks for manufacturing & shipment.

title: Neutron Star Twinkle
body_html:
Our Neutron Star fountain pen ink bursts onto paper with a sparkling array of blue and sheening iridescent purples, pinks, and reds with Twinkle pigments. Visible coloring will vary drastically by paper type and saturation, with high-quality fountain pen papers producing secondary colors most prominently and lower-quality papers staying closer to the ink's base blue hues.

Our swatch and writing sample is produced on 68gsm Tomoe River paper, which strongly emphasizes the secondary colors specifically (making our samples look purple on camera.) It's very difficult to display the color array of sheening inks on-screen.

Twinkle inks require additional pen maintenance and cleaning compared to their traditional ink peers and perform best in a pen with a medium-sized nib or broader. Please don't use Twinkle inks in vintage pens or pens that cannot be disassembled for cleaning.

title: Lilac Cotton
body_html:
HIGHLY WATER RESISTANT | ARCHIVAL

Our Everlasting Fountain Pen Ink series is formulated using fountain pen safe pigments. We've built a vehicle around this unique colorant to produce an archival and highly water resistant writing ink.

Everlasting pigmented inks require extra maintenance to use effectively. Frequent pen cleaning is suggested, as with all pigmented fountain pen inks. Pigmented ink should not be permitted to dry inside a pen. The permanent nature of the pigment will stain some types of plastic, and with this we suggest Everlasting inks not be used in demonstrator pens. 

While we don't have independent testing complete for lightfastness characteristics, due to the nature of the colorant we anticipate a moderate level of lightfastness.

Every batch of Birmingham fountain pen ink is manufactured by hand in-house from a series of raw ingredients selected for quality and consistency. Each bottle is poured, capped, and labeled by hand.

title: Sterling Silver
body_html:
Red in the bottle, a medium rose-shifted grey when wet, and mildly tarnished silver when dried on (most) paper, expect the unexpected with Sterling Silver. Depending on paper type, saturation, and room lighting, this hue may display wildly differently.  

Sterling Silver is part of the Delicate Formula fountain pen ink line, best for delicate vintage pens* and easily washable from most surfaces with soap and water. The 100mL volume will provide approximately 125 standard converter refills assuming a 0.8mL draw. 

Enjoy Sterling Silver as a standalone fountain pen ink, or blend it with other Birmingham Pen Co. fountain pen inks to craft your personalized shade.

body_html:

Ink Ingredients
Diluent - Highly purified laboratory grade water to ensure consistency
Thickener - Tempers feathering
Humectants - Influences dry-time
Lubricants - Regulates flow & performance
Surfactants - Regulates flow & performance
Preservative - Adds shelf life for safe long-term use & storage
Colorants - Powder dyes to bring colors alive in the solution

title: Parrot
body_html:
Fountain pen ink is manufactured by hand in the workshop from a series of raw ingredients selected for stability and performance. Our inks are compounded with diluent, thickener, humectant, lubricant, surfactant, preservative, and colorant. Ingredients are meticulously combined and refined over roughly two dozen steps with a minimum of three thorough mixing steps per color to ensure quality and consistency within every small batch.

The 60mL volume will provide approximately 75 standard converter refills with an average 0.8mL draw. Each jar is carefully poured and labeled by hand. Glass bottles arrive prepared in our beautifully foiled Birmingham Pen Co. gift box.

title: Oblique 2x Broad #6 Gilded
body_html:
This #6 size Knox nib features a tipped oblique double broad tip with the Knox design stamp. The two-tone process is subtractive in that each nib is fully gold plated then individually dipped into a solution to remove the gilding to expose the polished steel underneath.

Our Collar & Feeder option arrives with the nib pre-installed into housing with feeder, compatible with our Model-C fountain pens.

title: Coal Ash
body_html:
HIGHLY WATER RESISTANT | ARCHIVAL

Our Everlasting Fountain Pen Ink series is formulated using fountain pen safe pigments. We've built a vehicle around this unique colorant to produce an archival and highly water resistant writing ink.

Everlasting pigmented inks require extra maintenance to use effectively. Frequent pen cleaning is suggested, as with all pigmented fountain pen inks. Pigmented ink should not be permitted to dry inside a pen. The permanent nature of the pigment will stain some types of plastic, and with this we suggest Everlasting inks not be used in demonstrator pens. 

While we don't have independent testing complete for lightfastness characteristics, due to the nature of the colorant we anticipate a moderate level of lightfastness.

Every batch of Birmingham fountain pen ink is manufactured by hand in-house from a series of raw ingredients selected for quality and consistency. Each bottle is poured, capped, and labeled by hand.

body_html:

Our Collar & Feeder option arrives with the nib pre-installed into housing with feeder, compatible with our Model-C fountain pens.

title: 1.1mm Stub #6 Polished
body_html:
Crafted in Germany by some of the world's most exceptional nib makers, this Nemosine nib features a 1.1mm stub tip in what is commonly referred to as a #6 size. Stub nibs are cut and polished without the addition of tipping material as is used on traditional nib points. 

Our Collar & Feeder option arrives with the nib pre-installed into housing with feeder, compatible with our Model-C fountain pens.

title: Ink Converter Set
body_html:
A converter functions as the ink reservoir within a fountain pen, operating with a twisting plunger mechanism to draw fluid for storage in the cylinder. The receiver fits a standard international-sized nozzle which is by far the most common size, compatible with a variety of fountain pens. Every Birmingham Pen Co. fountain pen includes one converter, but it's common to hold extra on hand. 

Each set includes two (2) separate ink converters. The cylinder will draw approximately 0.8mL of ink per fill. This converter is currently compatible with all Birmingham Pen Co. fountain pens.

title: Gift Card
body_html:
Gift a truly unique hand-crafted experience with a Birmingham Pen Company Gift Card. Gift cards never expire and are valid on all products in our shop. Value denominations range from $25 to $500 USD. 

Gift cards are delivered instantly by email to the buyer after purchase and contain instructions to redeem at checkout.

title: 0.8 Stub #6 Polished
body_html:
Crafted in Germany by some of the world's most exceptional nib makers, this Nemosine nib features a 0.8mm stub tip in what is commonly referred to as a #6 size. Stub nibs are cut and polished without the addition of tipping material as is used on traditional nib points.

Our Collar & Feeder option arrives with the nib pre-installed into housing with feeder, compatible with our Model-C fountain pens.
